Who was a farmer and later a land surveyor for the government?	 LeRoy Pollock was a farmer and later a land surveyor for the government.
Who was a farmer and later a land surveyor for the government?	 LeRoy Pollock was a farmer and later a land surveyor for the government.
Regarding this topic, what did David Alfaro Siqueiros do?	Pollock was introduced to the use of liquid paint in 1936 at an experimental workshop operated in New York City by the Mexican muralist David Alfaro Siqueiros.
Who used hardened brushes, sticks,?	Jackson Pollock used hardened brushes, sticks.
When were his papers donated by Lee Krasner?	In 1983.
Did Free Jazz feature a Pollock painting as its cover artwork?	Yes.
Was Paul Jackson Pollock an influential American painter as well as a major figure in the abstract expressionist movement?	Yes, Pollock was an influential American painter and a major figure in the abstract expressionist movement.
Give an example of the origins of the term action painting. 	Pollock's technique of pouring and dripping paint is thought to be one of the origins of the term action painting.
During his lifetime, did Pollock enjoy considerable fame and notoriety?	Yes.
Was he regarded as a mostly reclusive artist?	Yes, he was regarded as a mostly reclusive artist.
